      take an emotional snapshot of this moment, for nostalgia's sake

      "just enough"

      anything is possible

      go down the block

      before the gardener, the garden was self gardening

      "common sense"

for every instrument

      A, B

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

      i have no idea

      to avoid overwhelming the customer

      no

     no

      yes

      i haven't decided yet

9.14.22  11:32 am   can i do the thing when i do the thing  when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing when i do the thing

      sure

9.14.22  11:11 am   Are feelings meanings? And, are meanings feelings?

      sure

9.14.22  10:30 am   I cannot stop listening to 'where i've been' it is so good. do you take people's emails?

     sure

     I want to be the first person to know about a big announcement

9.14.22  10:27 am   now it's time for the standard question when you release a new song (now for "where i've been): what's the story/inspiration behind it and its creation, and what are some other juicy little details you can share about it?

      the melody and chords for the verse are from april 2019 and there is really no story about that. i just came up with it and filed it away. During the selection process to choose the next song after the 'money' song was finished, one of the items i was looking at using was that item. i had started using a technique where i roam around google streetview while writing. i was particularly stuck trying to find a lyric for this. and i can tell you what finally triggered the first 4 lines of lyric was looking south at the string of powerlines, from this location: 47°06'14.1"N 119°33'31.2"W, looking south. it would have been the june 2019 coverage. it would have looked something like this

9.14.22  9:05 am   wow, you predicted the length of your next video to the second! how did you do that?

      it must have been already done at the time i said that. i actually could have also known it many days before, because the timing of all audio was finalized by the time the song production was finished, but, still i don't recall ever actually checking the run time until i was asked recently, and by the time i answered that, the entire video was indeed final

9.14.22  7:29 am   favourite adjective 

      high

9.14.22  6:44 am   how do you do this

      i don't know

9.14.22  6:39 am   what is ur favourite food

      trash

9.14.22  5:39 am   about that "goodbye" figure in where i've been with the tractor on screen --- are you nesting duplets into the 3/16th spaces from the '4 &' till about the '2 &'

     just about

     to sort of complement the tresillo-ish 3s in the drum groove?

     well, no, the drum groove probably had no effect on this

      also, how did it feel when you came up that figure and it landed nicely in the song?

     fine, but the next section or even the start time of the next section was not previously known until that riff existed. so it's not like the riff had any constraints, really. the bigger factor in my feelings was, 'i hope this next section works' because the section that follows was the 3rd major rewrite. there were 2 entirely different alternate endings

9.14.22  5:06 am   you ever seen garfield?

      i don't recall

9.14.22  3:15 am   how do i stop my wife from eating all the kasha before i can have any? i can only buy so much

      you may have to start going on some secret kasha vacations. a 'vakashion'

9.14.22  1:20 am   help. i hate the d7 chord. what to do about it

      have you considered counseling

9.14.22  1:05 am   how do i sleep

      i have no idea. sleep is a mystery to me

9.14.22  12:51 am   what was your favorite question someone typed here

      this one

9.14.22  12:41 am   what's your opinion on life 

      ridiculous

9.14.22  12:36 am   Will you consider smashing the guitar into the ground to assert dominance over other guitar players?

      sure

9.14.22  12:12 am   Hey Bill, I'm in movie school at USC. How do I write a movie?

      the first thing to do is, write the actual first scene at the actual beginning of the movie, instead of wasting several minutes on an opening credits montage. just kidding, i assume it must be illegal to skip that, as i'm you've been told

9.14.22  12:09 am   how are you doing today?

     pretty good

      and should I go to graduate school?

      i don't know. i'm not sure exactly what that is. i think it also depends whether you are using the word 'graduate' as a verb or adjective

      that's nice

      over rated

      it is assumed so

9.13.22  10:40 pm   whats the right thing to do 

      everything

9.13.22  10:25 pm   whats your favorite letter in the alphabet

      t

9.13.22  10:19 pm   is it intended for me to try to find as much personal meaning as i can in each of your songs/videos?

      yes

9.13.22  10:00 pm   is there a name for the groove you were getting into the section that starts 'pave the way, it's already been paved today' etc.

      i'm not sure

9.13.22  9:59 pm   If you had to rename Tuesday, what would you name it?

      2's day

9.13.22  9:58 pm   favorite song currently?

      still searching for one

9.13.22  9:04 pm   it seems like tuesday has acquired new meaning (or more of the same meaning) to you since you recorded your song "tuesday". do you think you'll make another song or sketch or whatever that explores your thoughts/feelings on tuesdays a little more in depth at some point?

      in the "money" song, there is a line that says "hello, it's a tuesday show". i mention the days of the week quite commonly in my songs, so nowadays when that idea comes up, sometimes i actually search for an unlikely choice. maybe the one i've used the least

9.13.22  8:42 pm   what do you think stops artists from sharing their art?

      scheduling conflicts,

9.13.22  8:13 pm   how do you come up with the videos you make?

      i don't know

9.13.22  7:32 pm   when making songs, do you have more fun writing the songs, making the music, or making the visuals?

      i don't know

9.13.22  7:19 pm   is the visual effect at 3:09 in your new song just a trick with mirrors?

      no

9.13.22  7:04 pm   what is your favorite word from your songs

      this is a paradox because whatever my favorite word is will be used too much and then it immediately becomes my least favorite word

9.13.22  6:39 pm   How many pickles have you eaten in your lifetime

      less than 1

9.13.22  6:07 pm   Am I the only person who remembers when McDonald's sold bagel breakfast sandwiches

      no. i actually thought they still did
